scripts.qa: PORT=3001 REACT_APP_SERVER_TYPE=qa REACT_APP_VERSION=$(git describe --tags --abbrev=0) react-scripts start
scripts.prod: PORT=3001 REACT_APP_SERVER_TYPE=prod REACT_APP_VERSION=$(git describe --tags --abbrev=0) react-scripts start
